mapper.select: select * from salpa.checkpage where date > now() and date = (select max(date) from salpa.checkpage where actualpage is not null)
mapper.insert: insert into checkPage (date, planpage, planpageperday,study_id) values (#{date}, #{planpage}, #{planpageperday},#{study_id})
mapper.update: update salpa.checkpage set actualpage=#{actualpage}, updatetime = now() where date = #{date} and study_id=#{study_id} and deleted = 0
update study set updatetime=now() where id=#{study_id}
